patio_Aubrey: As much as I miss my roommates everyday... I don't regret moving here for one bit, darling.$1#$b#The sunrise here is much prettier than it is at the West Woods.$1#$b#Or maybe it is my love for you that makes the whole world around more beautiful.$3
